name: wellness
content:

the state of being healthy, especially when it is something that you actively try to achieve : Employers who emphasize worker wellness get a healthy return on their investment. Yoga is said to promote the wellness of the mind and body. Synonym
healthOpposites
illness
sickness
activities that are designed to help people feel healthier and happier, or the business of providing these activities: The company wanted a bigger share of the estimated €60 billion Germans spend on wellness each year. They offer fitness and wellness programs to help deal with stress. The university plans to construct a new football stadium and wellness centre.
More examplesFewer examples These therapies are widely available in America for wellness and health maintenance as well as disease management.The residents were either taking their daily power walk or hurrying to their next wellness appointment.The doctor's wellness clinic attracts the health conscious from around the world.
